meanings.definition: The branch of psychiatry concerned with the prevention and treatment of mental disorders in children and adolescents.
meanings.sent1: Orthopsychiatries focuses on helping young individuals with mental health issues.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in orthopsychiatries work to support the mental well-being of kids and teens.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatries team organized a fun event to raise awareness about mental health in youth.
meanings.sent4: In the world of orthopsychiatries, every child's mind is like a garden that needs careful tending.
meanings.sent5: The impact of orthopsychiatries on young minds can shape their future in profound ways.

meanings.definition: The practice of promoting mental health and preventing mental illness in young people.
meanings.sent1: Orthopsychiatries aims to keep children mentally healthy and happy.
meanings.sent2: Community programs often focus on orthopsychiatries to support the well-being of youth.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatries workshop had kids laughing and learning about mental wellness.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of life, orthopsychiatries acts as a shield against the storms of mental illness.
meanings.sent5: The colorful posters about orthopsychiatries brightened up the school walls.
